name: BitChute // Frostbite // 2020
description:
**Built for DARK MODE BitChute (enable in the top right corner using the moon/sun icon)**

If you, too, find the harsh reds of BitChute off-putting, here's a potential solution!

This theme softens the colors of the streaming website with a Steam-lite treatment. Now you can combat the anti-trust, monopolistic powers of Silicone Valley in style.

Features an expanded container pane for your desktop viewing pleasure, and the video page will have more familiarity with Youtube's format.
additional_info:
v1.05 - 5/11/2020 - most hover hrefs should be fixed
v1.04 - 2/14/2020 - channel card hover fix, notification link fix
v1.03 - 12/9/2019 - red link fixes
v1.02 - 9/3/2019 - red link fixes, notification updates, no more channel card radius
v1.01 - 7/8/2019 - fixed notifications box and page
v1.00 - 6/7/2019

CC BY-NC-ND - Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs
(Note: only chose this option because in the past there have been people who copy a style and upload it with changes only to never update it again)

Customization settings:
* For mobile devices, use Mobile or it may cause undesirable effects.
* For desktop, should you want to use the default BitChute page width, choose "Mobile".
